name: web4-slides
description: Slides for the Web4 course at HoGent

scripts.deploy-backend: git subtree push --prefix recipeapp/backend heroku-backend master
scripts.commit-build-changes: git add . && git commit -m 'chore(build): build files'
scripts.deploy-frontend: npm run build-frontend && npm run copy && commit-build-changes && git subtree push --prefix serve-frontend heroku master
